page.content_html:
Position: Head of Laboratory (Livestock)

Address: Thi Tu Bo Thoi, Hong Tien, Khoai Chau, Hung Yen

JOB DESCRIPTION

- Carry out or supervise the performance of analysis, tests, etc. test criteria within the function of the laboratory;

- Guide and train employees in related technical processes;

- Evaluation to improve test quality, including expanding capacity and increasing accuracy;

- Manage data analysis and data security according to regulations;

- Arrange and arrange work for technicians;

- Implementation of reports, plans, programs;

- Perform other tasks as requested by direct and indirect superiors.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

- Professional degree: biotechnology, molecular biology, veterinary medicine, chemistry from university or higher;

- Foreign languages ​​and informatics: career development will be more favorable if fluent in English for communication and specialized English;

- Experience: at least 02 years of experience in (i) Molecular biology (PCR, real time PCR,...); (ii) Serology; (iii) microbiology, (iv) antibiogram, AND/OR (v) analytical chemistry;

- Skills in planning, analysis-synthesis-evaluation, report writing, teamwork-coordination, presentation-persuasion, proactive-independent work, communication: good.

* RIGHT:

- Negotiable income according to capacity

- Participate in professional training courses at the Company.

- Fully equipped with labor protection to serve the job.

- Welfare: according to the provisions of the Labor Code and other remuneration policies of the company (phone, car parking, holiday bonus, Tet ...)

- Day off: According to the current Labor Code regulations

* CONTACT INFO:

- Interested candidates, please send your CV via email: Tuyendung@mavinfarm.com

- Or contact Ms. Tuyen directly, Tel: 0989.539.856.
